channel.title: Server lag. Look please
channel.description: Alright, so if I have 10 or more people in any server that [b]I WOULD BE HOSTING[/b] it lags like hell. So...Can anyone like tell me what to do? When I go into other people's servers it works fine and doesn't lag until like 80 people. So...Post suggestions or things you think will help (sources, websites of programs to download, etc.). Thanks!

item.title: Server lag. Look please
item.dc:creator: @justin4143 justin4143
item.description:
@justin4143 wrote:

its not your internet or anything else. Its your RAM a server kills your computer it uses your ram so mutch. 1 person uses it alot so. If you have 10 it uses it alot more. So think about upgrading your RAM or buy a new comp. Or else your comp will die soon.

Read full topic

item.title: Server lag. Look please
item.dc:creator: @ryan123 ryan123
item.description:
@ryan123 wrote:

Uhh my internet is fast. I close everything else on my computer, and yea so don’t even tell someone their internet is slow when you don’t fucking know kk?

Read full topic

item.title: Server lag. Look please
item.dc:creator: @wooker wooker
item.description:
@wooker wrote:

Your computer has to many processes running causing the server to lag, Your computer can’t handle running a server, Your internet connection is slow, etc. The list goes on.

Read full topic

item.title: Server lag. Look please
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Its your router, what i did was run my servers from a separate clean laptop.

Read full topic
